citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Ocean Science And Productivity, Pacific
citeinfo.title: Atmospheric CO2/C13 data from various Canadian locations, 1974-present

descript.abstract: Atmospheric carbon dioxide measurements from Alert, NWT (1974- 2000 ,continuing), Sable Island (1974-1981), Cape St. James (1974-1981), Kains Island (1978-1984)and Quatsino Light Station (1981-1984). Also from ships of opportunity travelling between Canada and Japan (Canadian Ace, Canada Maru, Skaugran) and Canada and Australia (Lillooet) and oceanographic cruises.
descript.purpose: Monitoring long term changes of atmospheric carbon dioxide; 13C:12C ratios .
descript.supplinf: Risk Justification: Custodian will be leaving soon and has a large quantity of data not secured in a regional data centre. Risk of Loss: High Impact Justification: Long term time series (more than 10 years), large volume of high quality data Impact of Loss: High Recommended Action: Obtain access to the data and bring data to archives.

idinfo.useconst: Some data not yet prepared for publication, not qualilty checked. AES own some Alert/Sable Island data.

cntaddr.address: Institute of Ocean Sciences, P.O. Box 6000, 9860 West Saanich Road

dataqual.logic: Interlaboratory comparisons, calibration of instrumentation with known standards.
dataqual.complete: Dataset Complications: Before 1988, analyses were done on an infrared spectrometer; after 1988 they were done on a mass spectrometer.

cntaddr.address: Institute of Ocean Sciences, P.O. Box 6000, 9860 West Saanich Road

Hardcopy Description: Log data sheets and analysis data Hardcopy Volume: At least 10 feet of 3in binders in lab/office and 15 4in binders in store room. Physical Sample Exists: Y Physical Sample Locations: Valerie Forsland, Rm 1414 IOS Physical Sample Volume: Null Physical Sample Description: Sealed ampoules of extracted air samples and sealed flasks of unextracted air. Physical Sample Complications: N/A
